description.value:
Special: Accurate, Blast (5)

Note: Living creature with bombs strapped to it, may make +0 Wrangling Test to feed scrap, adds +3 PEN. For Orks, Rare. Kraftsmanship: Poor: autojams for non-orks, -0.5kg, Good: +5 WS/BS, +0.5kg, Best: +5 WS/BS, +1 damage, one Kustom Bit, +1kg.
